data.comment: The match is underway in Saint Etienne.
Benoit Bastien awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Lille to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benoit Bastien signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Lille's half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 9, Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Lille's Luiz Araujo breaks free at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Saint-Etienne pushes forward through Miguel Trauco, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Lille at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lille.
Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 17, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lille.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 22, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Saint Etienne to check on Mathieu Debuchy, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 28, Mathieu Debuchy is back on his feet again.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Domagoj Bradaric is booked for the away team.
Saint-Etienne are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Penalty! Benoit Bastien points to the spot, great chance for Saint-Etienne...
Goal! Saint-Etienne take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Wahbi Khazri spot-kick..
In the minute 35, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mahdi Camara (Saint-Etienne) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Saint-Etienne's Wahbi Khazri misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Lille to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Romain Hamouma of Saint-Etienne smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 45, Benoit Bastien signals a Lille throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 45, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
The first-half is over at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Attention is being given to Saint-Etienneâ€™s Harold Moukoudi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 50, Harold Moukoudi for Saint-Etienne is back on the field again.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Can Lille capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 52, Mathieu Debuchy (Saint-Etienne) has received a first yellow card.
Lille drives forward and Burak Yilmaz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 61, Great shot from Lille's Benjamin Andre but he is denied by the crossbar.
Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Benoit Bastien signals a Lille throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Throw-in for Lille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 65, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Jonathan Ikone.
Great play from Burak Yilmaz to set up the goal.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Saint-Etienne make their first substitution with Arnaud Nordin replacing Wahbi Khazri.
Free kick in a good position for Lille!
Kolo for Saint-Etienne has been booked by Benoit Bastien and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Christophe Galtier is making the team's first substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Jonathan Bamba replacing Isaac Lihadji.
In the minute 68, Burak Yilmaz's header is off-target for Lille.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a second substitution, with Reinildo Mandava replacing Domagoj Bradaric.
Yusuf Yazici is replacing Jonathan Ikone for Lille at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 70, Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Lille are caught offside.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
In the minute 71, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lille.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Romain Hamouma with Ryad Boudebouz. This is the second substitution made today by Claude Puel.
In the minute 75, Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Bastien awards Lille a goal kick.
Free kick Lille.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saint-Etienne's Denis Bouanga is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lille just outside Saint-Etienne's area.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In Saint Etienne Lille attack through Luiz Araujo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a fourth substitution, with Xeka replacing Benjamin Andre.
Jonathan David is replacing Luiz Araujo for Lille at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 88, Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Lille's area.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Yusuf Yazici for Lille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 89, Benoit Bastien awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Lille advance rapidly upfield but Benoit Bastien blows for offside.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lille.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Lille have a goal kick.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Lille.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
That's full-time at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. The final score is 1-1.
Alpha Sissoko is replacing Mathieu Debuchy for the home team.
The home team replace Zaydou Youssouf with Lucas Gourna Douath.
